creator: s02204038@np.edu.sg
text:
hi...i encounter some problems during my final year proj i hope u can help me. 
I had create this ssl website by going through all the procedures and the 
tomcat and the website all works fine. I can visit the website using my own 
comp (server) but when my friend tries to access my website through his comp 
by typing my ip add..a message appear "Access denied" and Forbidden 403. Why 
is this happening??? what i had to configure in order to i can let other users 
access my website?

creator: markt@apache.org
